Literature.Title: Ultrashort antibacterial and antifungal lipopeptides
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2006;103:15997–16002
Literature.Author: Makovitzki A, Avrahami D, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=20 µM,Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=37µM),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 26430(MIC=25µM),Aspergillus flavus ATCC 9643(MIC=100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC MYA-422(MIC=6.25µM)
